data.message: So, he takes a beating before winning fights (like Rocky) he is a southpaw (like Rocky) his wife gets killed (like Mick in Rocky 3) a guy tells his wife she hasn't been with a real man (like Mr. T "Clubber Lane" in Rocky 3) he goes back to some hole in the wall type of gym for a job (beginning of Rocky 2) and he seeks the training of the black coach to help him make a triumphant return (again, Rocky 3)...I feel like this movie is going to remind me a lot of a certain series of movies that have already come out, right Joe Sedivy?

replies.message: Rocky's wife died to lol that was classic nice
True...completely forgot about that
Maybe in Southpaw 2 he'll fight a russian guy, retire and train a street fighter to be a boxer, then open an italian restaurant and we can get the whole series in 2 movies

Did I say I wouldn't see it? No...just calling out the similarities I noticed...so many people jumping to conclusions
